#summary Details on getMySoldItemFixedPriceList() API function

Call this function to get a list of sold fixed price items


== Call ==

 * syntax : getMySoldItemFixedPriceList(string token)

 * parameter : _string_ : secret token

== Response ==

 * response : _array_ : the response is always an array of 2 elements
  * element 1 : _boolean_ : true (if call ok) or false (if call not ok)
  * element 2 : 
   * if call ok : _array_ : list of sold fixed price items 
   * if call not ok : _string_ : error message

== Code example (PHP) ==
{{{
//FUNCTION CALL
list($success, $token) = $objSoapClient->authenticateUser('MyPersonalApiKey');

if (true === $success) {
  $return = $objSoapClient->getMySoldItemFixedPriceList($token);
}
}}}
